title: Cheese and onion bread pudding
ingredients: ['340 g (12 oz) day-old challah bread', '600 ml (1 pint) semi-skimmed milk', '3 eggs', 'pinch of crushed dried chillies', '100 g (3 1/2 oz) Emmenthal cheese, grated', '2 leeks, thinly sliced', '4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '2 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper']
